name: CodeStreak
description: CodeStreak is a full-stack habit-building platform that helps developers maintain daily coding consistency through rule-based challenges with friends. It automatically tracks LeetCode activity via GraphQL, evaluates daily goals, maintains streaks, applies penalties on failure, and provides analytics to encourage long-term discipline and growth.
features: Rule-based daily coding challenges with customizable goals
Automatic LeetCode submission tracking via GraphQL
Daily streak tracking and consistency metrics
Friend and group challenges with leaderboards
Automated daily evaluation using cron jobs
Analytics dashboard with progress and difficulty breakdown
Scalable backend architecture ready for AI coaching features
